# PWA Icons

You need to add two icon files to enable the PWA install prompt:

1. **icon-192.png** (192x192 pixels)
2. **icon-512.png** (512x512 pixels)

## Creating Icons

You can:
1. Use your existing favicon.svg and convert to PNG at 192x192 and 512x512
2. Use a tool like [Favicon.io](https://favicon.io/) or [RealFaviconGenerator](https://realfavicongenerator.net/)
3. Design custom icons with your app logo/branding

## Icon Guidelines

- Use a simple, recognizable design (terrarium, frog, gecko silhouette)
- Ensure good contrast for visibility on various backgrounds
- Include padding (safe area) to prevent clipping on rounded corners
- Test on both light and dark backgrounds

## Optional Screenshots

For better install prompts, add screenshots:
- **screenshot-desktop.png** (1280x720 pixels)
- **screenshot-mobile.png** (750x1334 pixels)

These show up in the install dialog on some browsers and help users understand what the app looks like.
